alert.note: Alert for Chambers; Coastal Harris; Inland Harris; Northern Liberty; Southern Liberty (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 6:04PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Chambers, southwestern Liberty and east central Harris Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 604 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mont Belvieu, or 10 miles east of Barrett. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Eastern Baytown, Liberty, Dayton, Beach City, Mont Belvieu, Old River-Winfree, Ames, Kenefick, Cove and Wallisville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Chambers; Coastal Harris; Inland Harris; Northern Liberty; Southern Liberty
